attributes.action: In response to the Ukraine crisis, take away empty Russian houses in the UK.
attributes.background: Please discuss removing empty Russian homes in the uk. It adds to the housing crisis, is a literal waste of space and leaves an income not necessarily affected by the sanctions imposed by the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418
